title: The BIG, Silent ConverZation
description:
Rik is continuing to play with the background for the Q/A sessions. He needed something for the computer monitors to play so he stripped these clips from the channel without sound. I think they make sort of a nice montage of the channel. No sounds, just faces talking. No audio version of this one of course. :) Enjoy.  

Thank you to each who have come to this channel over the years whether or not you made Rik's cut.
